title: Hej! ğŸ‘‹ğŸ½
text:
I am Taimur Khan, a Data Scientist at the Helmholtz-Center for Environmental Research (UFZ) in the BioDT project. Combining advances in computational and ecological sciences, I aid partnered researchers and engineers in creating Digital Twin systems that can replicate, monitor, and predict the Earthâ€™s dynamic systems using modern methods in software engineering, earth observation, and computational modelling. I am also a part-time Masterâ€™s student at the University of Leipzig, studying Earth System Data Science and Remote Sensing.
Â© Taimur Khan.
